Comment.value:
good reaction

Female commoner of Charwood outside her home. Her name is Maryweather. 
She stands here always. Her child is a short distance away. As soon as a player approaches, a small scene happens where her child is taken by shadowy creatures. They all disappear into a portal. If the player speaks to the woman, she denies all knowledge. She claims her child is fine, and another version of him spawns from the house. When the dialogue is over, after a time, the child will cause the scene to be repeated. Again the woman will deny knowledge. This continues inifitely.

This character should have the following description when examined:
"The people of this town look perfectly healthy, but there is something wrong. Their eyes are all focussed far away, and no one seems to have much of a purpose. There is no work being done, and there is no bustle of commerce. Everyone is listless, and a pall of despair hangs on everyone's faces."
